title: Hydrocodone Combination Products (HCPs) move to Schedule II Only (GDNA - Georgia Drugs and Narcotics ...
text: ( Source : GDNA - Georgia Drugs and Narcotics Agency ) Hydrocodone Combination Product ( HCP ) rescheduling C-III to C-II Effective October 6, 2014 The DEA has finalized its rule to reschedule hydrocodone combination product (HCP) from Schedule
